FuncDef: This command specifies how to interpret the session-timeout coming from a RADIUS VSA in an Access-Accept or CoA message.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the VSA is interpreted as an IPv4 lease time if the Alc-Lease-Time attribute is not present and an absolute timeout otherwise. The VSA is treated the same as for non-ipoe session DHCP hosts.
Specifies that the VSA meaning is irrelevant for IPoE session and should be ignored.
Specifies that the VSA would be treated as a timeout starting from the moment the IPoE session is set up.

ExtraInfo: Default: radius-session-timeout absolute (backward compatible on wlan-gw group interfaces)
